description: A finely milled all-purpose flour perfect for baking cakes, pastries, and breads. Achieve a smooth batter and crispy texture in fried snacks or use as a thickener for gravies and sauces.
Made from premium chana dal, this protein-rich besan is ideal for traditional Indian snacks like pakoras and dhokla. High in fiber and minerals, it's a wholesome addition to your kitchen.
Certified organic besan, ground from select chickpeas. Free from chemicals and pesticides, this flour is perfect for both sweets and savory dishes, offering a rich taste and nutritional boost.
Long-grain broken basmati rice with a delicate aroma and fluffy texture. Great for daily meals, biryanis, and desserts, ensuring authentic flavor in every bite.
Wholesome broken wheat porridge, easy to digest and packed with nutrients. Enjoy as a hearty breakfast or blend into soups for added texture and nutrition.
Premium thick flattened rice, ideal for making traditional Indian breakfast dishes. Low in fat and rich in carbohydrates, it’s a quick and nutritious meal option.
Aged basmati rice with a rich aroma and slender grains. Carefully selected for premium quality, it’s perfect for daily meals and special occasions alike.
Nutritious brown rice high in fiber and essential minerals. Ideal for health-conscious diets, it cooks quickly and keeps you feeling full longer.
Hand-selected sonamasuri rice, naturally grown for a light and fluffy texture. Perfect for curries, biryanis, and everyday meals.
Organically grown white poha, easy to digest and rich in iron. Enjoy as a quick breakfast or healthy snack, low in calories and free from preservatives.
High-fiber flattened rice, perfect for a nutritious and filling breakfast. Simple to prepare and packed with essential nutrients for a balanced diet.
